(Ok...as kind of a newly appointed duty...I have to ask a few questions that 
are of great concern.

To Earth, AKA Bobertron, hate to break it to you, but you're kind of moding.  
By giving your little proposal to all those people.  For one, Black Arachnia, 
Inferno, and Rampage are in the Ark running from internal defenses.  You'd 
have to magically get in their and speak to them.

Scorponok is in a hidden base.  You'd have to magically find him.

---

As for Icedemon, how are you finding everything?  Magically finding 
Megatron's unfinished base that is hidden deep in a mountain.  This is NOT 
the first, second, or even fifth time you've done that Icedemon.  Just being 
in that mountain (depending on the rock, it's up to whoever made up the 
mountain may block conventional scanners.  It's good that you've stopped with 
the portals, that's a start.  But you really shouldn't find everything out so 
easily.  It doesn't make a lot of sense most of the time and it ruins other 
people's fun.  (Not that ruining other people's fun is bad , but you do it 
constantly by somewhat moding).
